original_text: Those who conspired against him were Zabad the son of Shimeath the Ammonite, and Jehozabad the son of Shimrith the Moabite.
korean_text: 반역한 자들은 암몬 여인 시므앗의 아들 사밧과 모압 여인 시므릿의 아들 여호사밧이더라

sentences.original_text: were Zabad the son of Shimeath the Ammonite
and Jehozabad the son of Shimrith the Moabite
